capabilities.title: Search Experience Framework
capabilities.tagline: Unified SDK for consistent search experiences
capabilities.desc: A comprehensive SDK and component library that powers search interfaces across web, mobile, and embedded applications. Provides pre-built UI components, event tracking, and consistent behavior patterns.
keyFeatures: Pre-built search UI components (search bar, results grid, facets, filters)
Event tracking and analytics integration out-of-the-box
Responsive design for web, tablet, and mobile
useCases: Rapid deployment of search interfaces across multiple properties
Consistent user experience across B2B portals and customer-facing sites

capabilities.title: Behavioral Analytics Engine
capabilities.desc: Captures and analyzes every search interaction—queries, clicks, add-to-carts, and purchases—to build a complete picture of buyer behavior. Powers personalization, trending, and optimization insights.
technicalDetails: Data retention configurable (30 days to unlimited)
useCases: Identify high-volume queries with low conversion for optimization
Track seasonal patterns and emerging product trends

capabilities.title: Multi-Modal Ingestion Pipeline
capabilities.tagline: Connect any data source to search
capabilities.desc: A flexible data pipeline that ingests product catalogs, documents, images, and behavioral data from any source. Handles incremental updates, full refreshes, and real-time streaming.
keyFeatures: Connectors for ERP, PIM, DAM, and e-commerce platforms
Support for CSV, JSON, XML, and proprietary formats
Image and document processing (OCR, PDF extraction)
technicalDetails: REST API, SFTP, S3, and database connectors
useCases: Process spec sheets and extract searchable attributes
Real-time inventory updates from warehouse systems

capabilities.title: Generative Data Enrichment Pipeline
capabilities.desc: Uses large language models and computer vision to automatically generate missing product descriptions, extract attributes from images, and create searchable content from sparse data.
technicalDetails: GPT-4 and Claude integration for text generation
CLIP and custom vision models for image analysis
useCases: Enrich 100K sparse catalog entries with rich descriptions
Extract thread pitch and dimensions from fastener images
Generate SEO-friendly content for product pages

capabilities.title: A/B Testing Framework
capabilities.desc: Run controlled experiments to measure the impact of search changes—ranking algorithms, UI variations, synonym additions—with statistical rigor. Know what actually improves conversion.
useCases: Test new ranking algorithm against baseline
Measure conversion lift from UI changes

capabilities.title: Interleaving Testing
capabilities.desc: A more sensitive alternative to A/B testing for ranking changes. Interleaves results from two ranking algorithms in a single result set and measures which results users prefer through clicks.
keyFeatures: Team Draft and Balanced interleaving methods
useCases: Test semantic vs keyword ranking blend
